code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import"./taskpage.css";import Nv from"./topnav";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TaskDetails=()=>{const{taskId}=useParams();const[tasks,settasks]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch("https://task-scheduler-kt4g.onrender.com/getall",{method:"POST",body:JSON.stringify({"uuid":localStorage.getItem("uuid")}),headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}}).then(r=>r.json()).then(d=>{settasks(d);}).catch(e=>{console.log(e);});},[]);const task=tasks.find(todo=>todo._id===taskId);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nv,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-details-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"task-details-heading",children:"Task Details"}),task&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"task-name",children:task.task_heading}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"task-info",children:task.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"task-time",children:["Time: ",task.time]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"task-notes",children:["Notes: ",task.notes]})]})]})]});};export default TaskDetails;
